easy.name: St Abbs Head
easy.time: 2+ hours walk to Mire Loch, a lighthouse and along the cliffs

easy.name: Elie to Anstruther Walk
easy.start: Ruby Bay car park in Elie
easy.time: 2-3hrs for the 6 mile distance. Return to your starting point by bus.

easy.name: The Hermitage
easy.time: 10 min walk from the car park to Ossian's Hall. 2 hour to walk the Braan Perth.

easy.name: Newburgh Beach
easy.start: Car park near Newburgh Golf Club

medium.name: The Galloway Hills
medium.start: Bruce’s Stone car park, Loch Trool

medium.name: Mountain Trail at Beinn Eighe
medium.start: Coille na Glas Leitre Trails car park

medium.name: Goatfell
medium.start: Brodick Castle (easy access by public transport)
medium.time: 4.5 – 6 hours from Brodick Castle + 1 hour one-way from the ferry terminal

hard.name: Loch Ossian Munros
hard.time: 3 – 5 hours (Beinn na Lap), 7 – 8 hours (Sgor Gaibhre and Carn Dearg)

hard.name: Aonach Eagach
hard.start: Small car park near Allt-na-reigh, Glencoe
